Articles.Content: First off big fan and been really hype for this game every since it was announced.  I understand that this is early access and things are subject to change and improve. One the major things that  needs to be changed is the pixeled artwork and text on UI.  Like yes some of the things i can understand the pixeled nature(time or stuff like that). But other things like menus and popups, icons. Like this is way too much. This is not an 8-bit game.  It 2023 with people having high enough resolution screens to have full and sharp icons and text. It makes you focus so much harder on the ui than needed(can see people getting strained from trying to read and understand things). Some solutions either have this as a option in the game settings or redo the text and icons. Please!!!! I really dont want to have to find an UI mod in order to understand what im looking at.
